safetyTips: Food is cooked inside a vacuum sealed jar. Every jar is cleaned with antibacterial solution from the outside before delivery. Returned jars are sterilised at high temperature.
name: Ambra's Kitchen
description: Fresh handmade dishes like you might find in a trattoria or an Italian grandmother's kitchen. Individually cooked portions using high quality ingredients. Main courses and desserts ready to eat in only 3 minutes. Cooked and delivered in a beautiful vacuum sealed glass jar, to preserve the yumminess up to 6 days. Most dishes are suitable for freezing. Zero waste packaging: Â£1 credit for any jar returned to us at next delivery. Place order through our website.
